nodes.text: "Limping Lady" is an adventure for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It was written by Peter M. Schweighofer and published in the magazine Challenge 64. The story involves a group of spacers on Tatooine who are looking to buy a starship. They learn of a light freighter for sale by a Saurian named Sithless Leethe, who agrees to give them a deal on the Limping Lady if they only run an unspecified cargo for him. The cargo turns out to be stolen Imperial blasters destined for the Felinians of Zoma V. After a firefight with Imperial TIE/IN interceptors in orbit, the spacers escape with the cargo.
